00032 #define NETMDERR_USB                                    -1      /* general USB error */
00033 #define NETMDERR_NOTREADY                       -2      /* player not ready for command */
00034 #define NETMDERR_TIMEOUT                        -3      /* timeout while waiting for response */
00035 #define NETMDERR_CMD_FAILED             -4      /* minidisc responded with 08 response */
00036 #define NETMDERR_CMD_INVALID    -5      /* minidisc responded with 0A response */
